DOC.brief_summary: Purpose Primary endpoint - To evaluate 3-year disease free survival Second endpoint - To evaluate 3-year & 5-year overall survival To analyze toxicity quality life
DOC.brief_title: Adjuvant Chemotherapy Patients With Lymph Node Metastasis After Radical Surgery Cervical Cancer
DOC.criteria: cervical cancer stage Ia2IIa histology ; squamous , adeno , adenosquamous subtype age ; 20∼70 year performance status ; GOG 0∼2 medical illness hematologic , renal , hepatic function ; normal grossly residual disease histologically confirm lymph node metastases parametrial extension negative resection margin number retrieve lymph node ; ≥ 20 patient grade 2 peripheral neuropathy patient uncontrolled infection
